thread.title: Until Dawn sales were better than expected, so a sequel is already being discussed - Gaming
thread.title_full: Until Dawn sales were better than expected, so a sequel is already being discussed - Gaming News - Digital Spy

author: Liam Martin
title: Until Dawn sales were better than expected, so a sequel is already being discussed - Gaming
text: Sony has already described it as a "sleeper hit", but even its developers were surprised by how well Until Dawn sold.Executive producer Pete Samuels told PlayStation Lifestyle that the game "definitely surpassed expectations" and a sequel has been discussed. Â© Sony Until Dawn review: PS4's movie-like horror adventure is its own self-inflicted nightmareSamuels said: "We do talk internally about what Until Dawn 2 could be, as it clearly can't be a sequel in the traditional sense, with the same characters facing the same threat, not least of which because in different stories some or all of them are already dead!"We've investigated other ways we could do Until Dawn 2 but it probably is a little early to be discussing that."Developed by Tumble and Doctor Who: The Eternity Clock developer Supermassive Games, Until Dawn was released in August.It's described as a cinematic horror game that sees eight friends surviving the night in a remote retreat gone wrong.Check out our most anticipated games of October, one of many videos in Digital Spy's dedicated Gaming YouTube channel. Be sure to subscribe!
